pages.text:
Paddleboard Classes
.entry-header
Lesson prices
We proudly offer a variety of paddleboard lessons designed to cater to individual and group needs at competitive prices. For just
$65.00,
you can enjoy a lesson tailored for a single participant. If you prefer to learn with a friend, we provide lessons for two people at a cost of $130 For those who wish to bring along two additional friends, the three-person lesson is available for $195. Finally, our four-person group lesson is offered at $260 allowing friends and family to share the experience together. Each of these options includes a full hour of comprehensive group instruction and training, ensuring that everyone walks away with new skills and knowledge.
Additionally, we maintain a high standard of instruction by providing one dedicated paddleboard instructor for groups and individuals. This ensures that each participant receives personalized attention while benefiting from the dynamics of group learning.
Furthermore, for those seeking a more focused learning experience, paddleboard
private
lessons are also available at the rate of
$125.00.
This option allows students to receive one-on-one coaching tailored specifically to their individual goals and preferences.
“`
Paddleboard Classes Treasure Island
Paddleboard lessons are
coming soon
to the beautiful shores of Treasure Island, Florida, very soon, offering an exciting opportunity for both beginners and experienced
paddleboarders
to enhance their skills and enjoy the stunning coastal scenery.
There are numerous compelling reasons why you should consider learning how to paddleboard. This exciting water sport not only offers a great way to enjoy the outdoors but also provides an excellent workout for both your body and mind.
Paddleboard at Treasure Island Florida
Paddleboard Lessons
We can provide a paddleboard for your use, or you have the option to bring your own if you prefer. Additionally, we are more than happy to let you borrow our convenient paddleboard dolly, which will make transporting your paddleboard to our training area much easier, and then back to your car afterward. This way, you can focus on enjoying your time on the water without the hassle of carrying your equipment.
What to expect
All Paddleboard  lessons include a comprehensive 1 hour of structured instruction time, followed by an additional 30 minutes of leisure time, which allows you to practice and reinforce your skills independently by yourself. This combination ensures that you not only understand the material thoroughly but also get ample opportunity to apply what you have learned in a relaxed environment.
Location 10400 Gulf Blvd,
Treasure Island, FL. (parking lot)
Feel free to text us or give us a call to set up a paddleboard class tailored just for you. We look forward to helping you plan a wonderful experience on the water.
Our classes are conveniently held on both Friday and Sunday from 9am to 10am as well as from 4pm to 5pm, providing you with ample options to choose from. (weather permitting)
(727) 900-4329
Text/Call
sales@bigeventslides.com
10400 Gulf Blvd, Treasure Island, FL.
(parking lot address)
Discover
Why Choose Our Paddleboard Classes?
Our paddleboard classes in Treasure Island are the perfect opportunity to immerse yourself in the breathtaking coastal scenery while also giving your body a great workout. Our experienced instructors provide comprehensive lessons that cater to both beginner and experienced paddleboarders, ensuring that all participants walk away with new skills and knowledge. Plus, our competitive prices allow you to enjoy this water sport with your friends and family without breaking the bank. Contact us today to book your personalized paddleboard class and experience the thrill of gliding across the sparkling waters of Treasure Island!
727-900-4329 text

Location, Contact
.entry-header
1 Causeway Blvd, Clearwater, FL. 33767
10400 Gulf Blvd, Treasure Island, FL. 33706
Clearwater Beach Hours
10am - sunset peak season
Treasure Island Beach Hours 10am - sunset peak season
11am - 7pm off season 
Sept - February
Open everyday weather permitting.
Weather updated posted on Instagram
11am - 5pm off season
Sept - February
Open everyday weather permitting.
Weather updated posted on Instagram
Our operating hours are listed above, Monday – Sunday.
We are open every day, weather permitting. Follow us on Instagram for weather-related closure updates. Refer to our menu page for rides, located under
pictures
.
Our
pricing
is for each location with a list of our
activities
.
Treasure Island Cabana Rentals @ Treasure Island
rentals treasure island florida
Treasure Island Cabana rentals 
9am - 5pm weather permitting
Sunset Special on weekends 5pm - sunset
Hippo Waterslide Clearwater Beach activities next – pier 60
Our location is convenient and easily accessible. Clearwater Beach Florida location 1 Causeway Blvd, Clearwater (map Pier 60) and that will take you right to our location.
Our Treasure Island location is located at 10400 Gulf Blvd, Treasure Island Florida (address is the parking lot) we are across the street from Publix grocery store.
There is parking available (you pay at meter)
Text questions or reservation directly
(727) 900-4329
Email: Events@BigEventSlides.com
Contact us with any questions or to reserve a
cabana
rental or
umbrella
rental for your next event.  Or just need to contact us. We are happy to assist you and provide a customized experience tailored to your needs.
For a faster response, please reach out to us at: Main No. 727-900-4329 (text) for faster service.
Email: sales@bigeventslides.com

Contact us – reviews
.entry-header
Thank you so much to our valuable customers who take the time to give us a review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and it helps us to continually improve our services to meet your needs. Your comments and suggestions are always welcome and we thank you for your loyalty and support.
Click below to give us a Google Review
Clearwater Beach Google Review click here
Treasure Island Cabana Google reviewclick here
Treasure Island Waterslide Google Review click here
Email us:
terri@allaroundamusements.com
terri@bigeventslides.com
Text for faster response/ Call Us:
(727) 900-4329
We had a great time. A beautiful day at the beach. Aug 10
Ben
Great Vacation
Sarah
Love the sunsets and the giant waterslide. Aug 15
McKinzie
The workers are so kind and the kids had a blast!
Veronica
They were great, very nice and the kids the best deal. Aug. 4
Nicole
#vacation
Absolutely beautiful. Aug. 9
Jen
They have a giant waterslide, varous iflatables and a trampoline attraction. Definitely a fun addition to any beach day. The price is reasonable for what you would expect in a vacation spot. Aug. 4
Stacy
#giantwaterslide
Awesome Sunday Funday Drum Circle. Treasure Island. July 23
Brian
#drumcircle
Love this place, we had an amazing vacation with my family. July 3
Mer
#memories
My kids loved the slide at the beach. June 29
Jan
#lovetheslide
